    • getAddressById

    • createAddress

      @PostMapping("/") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UUID> createAddress(@RequestBody Address address)
      Create a new address if it doesn't already exist in the database. If a similar address already exists, return the ID of that address.
      Parameters:
      address - Address to create
      Returns:
      ID of the created address

    • updateAddress

      @PutMapping("/") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UUID> updateAddress(@RequestBody Address address)
      Addresses are never updated, because they can be used by multiple users/companies. If an address is updated, we check if a similar address already exists. If it does, we return the ID of that address. Otherwise, we create a new address and return its ID.
      Parameters:
      address - Address to update
      Returns:
      ID of the updated address

    • deleteAddress

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteAddress(@PathVariable UUID id)
      Remove an address from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the address to remove
